body:
Sports bettors providing 2021 Grammys Predictions?

Yeah. Fark yeah.

We bet on anything we can find an edge. And that definitely includes entertainment and political markets.

So let's analyze the 2021 Grammys, where the betting markets are dominated by the divas.

In this Grammys Predictions piece, we'll look at the most popular betting markets:

> * Record Of The Year
> * Album Of The Year
> * Song of the Year
> * Best New Artist

Firstly, we'll highlight the favorites and show the recent market movements. Then we'll refresh the content a week before the Grammys are announced with clear betting recommendations.

Now, onto the markets.

- - -

## **Album Of The Year**

Taylor Swift is the hot favorite in a head to head with Dua Lipa here.

Post Malone and the new Coldplay album are in the betting market but there hasn't been any support.

At this stage, Taylor's Folklore is absolutely the album to beat.

<canvas id='g121' name="brgraph" data-file-name="grammysAlbumYear.json" data-only-names="Folklore-Taylor Swift,Future Nostalgia-Dua Lipa" data-start="2021-02-26 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **Record Of The Year**

Can someone tell us the difference between a record and a song and an album?

We thought a song was a song. An album was a lot of songs. And a record was what you called an album before 1988.

Anyway...

The 2021 Record Of The Year market is another triple threat match.

But Dua Lipa's Don't Start Now is a comprehensive favorite.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/oygrmJFKYZY" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

<canvas id='g120' name="brgraph" data-file-name="grammysRecordYear.json" data-only-names="Don't Start Now - Dua Lipa,Black Parade - Beyonce,Circles - Post Malone" data-start="2021-02-26 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **Song Of The Year**

Cardigan has been backed in from +130 ($2.30) and will start favorite in a triple threat match.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/K-a8s8OLBSE" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Don't Start Now is the biggest challenger with Beyonce's Black Parade looking friendless in betting at this stage.

Call us simpleton's but 81M YoutTube views vs 470M views, Dua Lipa has to be in with a show here. The song came out six months earlier but this might be the market to watch for an upset on Grammy night.

<canvas id='g122' name="brgraph" data-file-name="grammysSongYear.json" data-only-names="Cardigan - Taylor Swift,Don't Start Now - Dua Lipa,Black Parade - Beyonce" data-start="2021-02-26 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **Best New Artist**

<canvas id='g123' name="brgraph" data-file-name="grammysBestNewArtist.json" data-only-names="Megan Thee Stallion,Doja Cat,Phoebe Bridgers" data-start="2021-02-26 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -
title: Grammys Predictions 2021: Your Best Bets
description: If you want expert Grammys Predictions, from professional sports bettors, then click on through. Unlike the blog crowd, we put our money where our mouth is. 2021 Grammys Predictions.
